<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> A vehicle turret will change locality when player gunner gets in it, just like vehicle changes locality when player driver gets in it. Many commands for turrets work only where turret is [[local]]. When gunner leaves turret it is supposed to change locality to the locality of the vehicle.

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if a turret is [[local]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''turretLocal''' turretPath

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] (or, prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145625, [[Nothing]] if the turret is non-existent)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isLocal = [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[turretLocal]] [0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (heli [[turretLocal]] [1]) [[then]] {heli [[setVehicleAmmo]] 1};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isNil]] {heli [[turretLocal]] [5]}) [[then]] {[[hint]] "Turret 5 is non-existent"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[turretOwner]], [[setVehicleAmmo]], [[setVehicleAmmoDef]], [[removeWeaponTurret]], [[addWeaponTurret]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[magazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazineTurret]], [[weaponsTurret]], [[currentMagazineDetailTurret]], [[currentMagazineTurret]], [[currentWeaponTurret]], [[selectWeaponTurret]], [[turretUnit]], [[allTurrets]]
</value></part></template>
